## Workspace.detachLeavesOfType() method

Remove all leaves of the given type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
detachLeavesOfType(viewType: string): void;
```

| --------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| <code>viewType</code> | <code>string</code> |             |
